publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3873 Stuart McMillan: NHS Health Newspaper Talking to the Massesâ€”That the Parliament congratulates NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde for providing its newsletter, Health News, in a talking newspaper format, allowing blind and partially sighted people to keep up-to-date with information about health services; notes that the NHS board will use JAWS audio software on its website for the talking newspaper; acknowledges that by providing its newsletter in this format NHS Greater Glasgow and Clyde is showing its commitment to providing accessible health information for visually impaired people, and encourages other NHS boards to improve the accessibility of information for blind and partially sighted people.
S3M-3873 NHS Health Newspaper Talking to the Masses (lodged on 3 April 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*, Bill Kidd*, Elaine Smith*, Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3873 NHS Health Newspaper Talking to the Masses (lodged on 3 April 2009) Michael Matheson*
S3M-3873 NHS Health Newspaper Talking to the Masses (lodged on 3 April 2009) Gil Paterson*
